actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to establish a Lufkin Division in the Eastern District of Texas, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Transfers Polk and Tyler counties from the Southern District of the United States District Court for Texas to the Eastern District. Establishes a Lufkin Division of the Eastern District.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to establish a Lufkin Division in the Eastern District of Texas, and for other purposes.
